description.name: LCD Display Digital Tyre Tread Depth Gauge 0 - 25,4mm
description.long_desc:
Digital depth gauge ideal for checking tread depth, brake shoe and pad wear.


Product Features



  • Quick to use

  • Clear LCD display

  • Metric & imperial scale

  • Zero button for quick re-calibration


Technical Data



  • Measuring Range: 0 - 25,4 mm / 0 - 1"

  • Resolution: 0,01 mm

  • Power Supply: SR44/LR44, 1.5 V battery (supplied)
description.short_desc:

description.name: Dial Tire Air Pressure Gauge Meter /plastic/
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Measures in both PSI (0 - 50 psi) and BAR (0 - 3,5 bar)

  • Pressure release button

  • Fitted with 45° angle chuck to allow easy connection to tire valve

  • Manufactured form durable plastic

description.name: Truck Dual Head Tyre Pressure Gauge
description.long_desc:
Designed to measure the pressure in the tyres of cars, trucks, motorcycles, quads, bicycles and all other vehicles whose wheels are equipped with typical automotive valve.


Product Features



  • Measures in both PSI (10 - 100 psi) and BAR (0,5 - 7,5 bar)

  • Dual head chuck ideal for inner style duals (dually) tyres

  • Extended steel shaft for easy pressure readings on awkwardly located valves

  • Overall length 200 cm
description.short_desc:
Designed to measure the pressure in the tyres of cars, trucks, motorcycles, quads, bicycles and all other vehicles whose wheels are equipped with typical automotive valve.


Product Features

  • Dual head chuck ideal for inner style duals (dually) tyres

  • Extended steel shaft for easy pressure readings on awkwardly located valves

  • Overall length 200 cm

description.name: Digital Tyre Pressure Gauge with Compass
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Ultra bright flashlight - great for measuring tyre pressure in the dark.

  • Measure units:


    • psi (0 - 100 psi)

    • bar (0 - 7 bar)

    • kg/cm2 (0 - 7)

    • kPa (0 - 700)


  • Auto-off function

  • Reset button

  • Built-in mechanical compass

  • Durable plastic shell
description.short_desc:

description.name: Hand Pump with manometer 38x530mm
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Integrated 2" easy-to-read gauge

  • Oversized handle provides a comfortable grip

  • Dual head fits both Schrader and Presta valves

  • Very tough aluminium barrel

  • Inflates up to 160 psi / 11 bar

  • Wide plastic base with gripper plates


Technical Data



  • Recommended Pressure: 0 - 8 bar

  • Height: 530 mm

  • Hose Length: 630 mm

description.name: Double Barrel Foot Pump GEKO Profi
description.long_desc:
Product Features



  • Double barrel gives increased capacity

  • Pressure range 0 - 7 bar

  • Dual head fits both Schrader and Presta valves

  • Sturdy anti-slip pedal and rubber feet

  • Adaptors for airbeds, cycle valves and balls provided

  • Steel construction


Technical Data



  • Operating Pressure: 0 - 7 bar / 0 - 100 psi

  • Hose Length: 650 mm

description.name: Staple Gun Chromed 4-14mm
description.long_desc:
Staple guns are used for many different applications and to affix a variety of materials, including insulation, house wrap, roofing, wiring, carpeting, upholstery, and hobby and craft materials..


Product Features



  • Compatible with: standard light duty staples 4-14mm, narrow crown staples 10-12 mm, gauge T-brad nails 10-14 mm

  • Adjustable driving force

  • Safety lock for safe and compact storage

  • Steel construction

  • Comfortable to use


Technical Data



  • Type: Manual Staple Gun

  • Staples Size: 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14 mm
description.short_desc:
Staple guns are used for many different applications and to affix a variety of materials, including insulation, house wrap, roofing, wiring, carpeting, upholstery, and hobby and craft materials..

  • Staples Size: 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 14 mm

description.name: Riveting Gun 10" (Japan type)
description.long_desc:
Hand Riveter Japan Style which can use 4 different size of rivets. Fastens sheet metal and heavy fabric in ductwork, construction, and auto body repair applications.


Product Features



  • 3 additional interchangeable heads and head wrench store in handle for quick size changes

  • Strong and reliable steel construction


Technical Data



  • Product Type: Hand Riveter

  • Nozzles Supplied: 2,4 / 3,2 / 4,0 / 4,8 mm

  • Number of Nozzles: 4

  • Overall Length: 254 mm
description.short_desc:
Hand Riveter Japan Style which can use 4 different size of rivets. Fastens sheet metal and heavy fabric in ductwork, construction, and auto body repair applications.


Product Features



  • 3 additional interchangeable heads and head wrench store in handle for quick size changes

  • Strong and reliable steel construction


Technical Data



  • Product Type: Hand Riveter

  • Nozzles Supplied: 2,4 / 3,2 / 4,0 / 4,8 mm

  • Number of Nozzles: 4

  • Overall Length: 254 mm

description.name: Long Arm Hand Riveter 17"
description.long_desc:
Lever Type Hand Riveter which can use 4 different size of rivets. Fastens sheet metal and heavy fabric in ductwork, construction, and auto body repair applications.


Product Features



  • Spring-loaded handle ejects rivet stem automatically

  • 3 additional interchangeable heads and head wrench

  • Strong and reliable steel construction

  • Double compound hinges that maximize leverage

  • Ergonomic rubber handle


Technical Data



  • Product Type: Hand Riveter

  • Nozzles Supplied: 2,4 / 3,2 / 4,0 / 4,8 mm

  • Number of Nozzles: 3

  • Overall Length: 410 mm

description.name: Air Riveter 2,4-6,4 mm
description.long_desc:
GEKO Air Riveting Gun is ideal for automotive and construction assembly work.


Product Features



  • Extended nose design

  • Hardened steel jaws

  • 3 additional interchangeable heads

  • Strong and lightweight aluminium construction

  • Mandrel catcher

  • Eliminates hand fatigue associated with use of manual rivet tools

  • Quick release 1/4" connect


Technical Data



  • Product Type: Air Riveter

  • Air Pressure: 90PSI

  • Air Inlet Size: 1/4 inch

  • Nozzles Supplied: 2,4 / 3,2 / 4,0 / 4,8 mm

  • Number of Nozzles: 4

description.name: Air Riveter 2,4-4,8mm
description.long_desc:
High quality Pneumatic Riveter designed for use with blind rivets with a diameter of 2.4 mm to 4.8 mm. It allows you to make durable connections with rivets made of aluminum, stainless steel, steel and copper.


Riveter equipped with a container for collecting waste produced during the riveting process. The riveter is perfect for working in production plants.


Product Features



  • Supports rivets with a diameter from 2.4 to 4.8 mm, made of aluminum, stainless steel, steel and copper

  • Comes with a plastic bottle to collect ejected pins

  • Powder coated riveter housing


Technical Data



  • Air Inlet: 1/4”

  • Compatible Rivet Diameter: 2.4, 3.2, 4.0, 4.8 mm

  • Air Hose Inner Diameter: 3/8”

  • Stroke Length: 14mm

  • Breaking Force: 1050 N

  • Working Pressure: 90psi (6.3bar)

  • Air Consumption: 0,86 l/min

  • Sound Power: 73 dB

  • Vibration: 0,6 m/s
description.short_desc:
High quality Pneumatic Riveter designed for use with blind rivets with a diameter of 2.4 mm to 4.8 mm. It allows you to make durable connections with rivets made of aluminum, stainless steel, steel and copper.

description.name: Plastic Pipe Cutter PVC 42 mm
description.long_desc:
PVC Plastic Pipe Cutter is suitable for all types of plastic and multi-layer pipe, up to 42mm. Minimum effort is required by the user due to the ratchet action cutting.


Product Features



  • Cuts pipe, conduit and plastic extrusions up to 42mm without crushing

  • Die cast aluminium construction

  • Stainless steel blade
